alert.note: Alert for Burleson; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 8:28PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Burleson and western Washington Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 828 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Giddings, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burton, Lake Somerville State Park & Trailway, Carmine and Quarry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
